org.araneaframework.uilib.event
Class StandardControlEventListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.event.StandardControlEventListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, Serializable
public class StandardControlEventListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements EventListener

This class manages onchange and onclick events of Controls that support those types of events.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
StandardControlEventListenerAdapter()
           
 
Method Summary
 void addOnChangeEventListener(OnChangeEventListener onChangeEventListener)
          Adds a OnChangeEventListener, which is called when the control value is changing.
 void addOnClickEventListener(OnClickEventListener onClickEventListener)
          Adds a OnClickEventListener, which is called when the control is clicked.
 void clearOnChangeEventListeners()
          Removes all registered onChange event listeners.
 void clearOnClickEventListeners()
          Removes all registered onClick event listeners.
 boolean hasOnChangeEventListeners()
          Returns whether there are any OnChangeEventListeners registered.
 boolean hasOnClickEventListeners()
          Returns whether there are any OnClickEventListeners registered.
 void processEvent(Object eventId, InputData input)
          Fires onChange or onClick event listeners, if they are in the request.
 void removeOnChangeEventListener(OnChangeEventListener listener)
          Removes given listener from the registered onChange event listeners.
 void removeOnClickEventListener(OnClickEventListener listener)
          Removes given listener from the registered onClick event listeners.

processEvent

public void processEvent(Object eventId,
                         InputData input)
                  throws Exception
Fires onChange or onClick event listeners, if they are in the request.

Specified by:
processEvent in interface EventListener
Parameters:
eventId - The ID of the event.
input - The request data of the event.
Throws:
Exception - Any runtime exception that may occur.
